author: Greg Sargent
title: What would robust federal testing really look like? A top expert explains.
description: We are woefully, shockingly short of what's needed to reopen our economy safely.
content: According to the Covid Tracking Project, we saw 152,000 tests on Tuesday. The numbers are slowly edging upward, but are mostly plateauing. Numerousstates and hospital professionals have sounded the alarm about the federal governments failure to marshal privat… [+6209 chars]
